website_summaries.verdict: The Adrenaline GTS 15 is a stability shoe for road running. High-quality performance, stability, and support are given by the Brooks Adrenaline GTS 15. It makes sure to keep the running experience as comfortable as possible, giving great coverage, cushioning and traction. Given the few negative comments, the shoe still needs to improve.
pros: The Element Mesh keeps the feet dry and secure
The 3D Fit Print overlays make the coverage feel lightweight and flexible
Many runners appreciated the stability that this shoe offered
The cushioning given by this shoe kept the feet of a lot of runners well-supported
The colorways of the Brooks Adrenaline GTS 15 are very appealing to look at
The blown rubber outsole provides protection and traction, while also adding a bit of cushioning
cons: The fabric on the sides tore apart, as observed by a few testers

customer_reviews.title: Brooks newbie
customer_reviews.text: First time I've tried Brooks running shoes. I bought them 1/2 size bigger than my shoe size and they are a good, comfortable fit. First outing with them was a half marathon and no blisters. You can't ask for more than that! Love the colours too.
customer_reviews.author: rara283

customer_reviews.title: Lovely colours but hard unforgiving sole.
customer_reviews.text: I love the colours and make of the shoe but the sole is very hard and unforgiving, especially to someone struggling with achilles tendonitis. Also size is as expected, followed advice and got a half size bigger and it was too big. Usually size 8.5 (EU 42).
customer_reviews.author: CatCZ

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable !
customer_reviews.text: Comfort from the minute I put them on. I had ordered a slightly bigger size as they are small fitting. Good arch support and quite light to wear. They are quite chunky and look a bit ridiculous with a work dress but for the ease of pain they've given I don't care!! The grip on the sole isn't great when walking on wet surfaces (train stations & stairs)
customer_reviews.author: Ciara Macleod

customer_reviews.title: I’m size 4 but after reading review decided to go ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m size 4 but after reading review decided to go half size up Still trainets were way too small I ended up returning them And bought new pair 1.5 size bigger!! There is something seriously wrong with the sizing Therefore I give 2 stars only
customer_reviews.author: Fox

customer_reviews.title: I oversized but needn't have. 1 shoe size up should be enough.
customer_reviews.text: I am size 7 shoe and have worn Adrenalines for years, increasing from 7.5 to 8 with gts14. Erring on the side of caution I purchased 8.5 but should have stuck with 8. A little bit slippyin the heel but toe length is good. They do feel a bit wider too.
customer_reviews.author: Crispy

customer_reviews.title: smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Have worn Brooks successfully before for running half marathons - these were a good size too small for me and sadly had to return. I walk in 7.5UK and run in 8UK normally.
customer_reviews.author: Modern Girl

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for trail running.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent running trainers. I'm on my second pair. Make sure you order at least half a size bigger (I'm 5.5 - 6, and had to order a 6.5 because Brooks sizing seems to be smaller)
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Brooks are no.1
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product of course bcoz its brooks...when ordering allow for xtra half size
customer_reviews.author: trauts

customer_reviews.title: Style and Colour
customer_reviews.text: Great colour and style the shoe fits very well I am a size 6 in Asics shoes but need to where 6.5 in brooks if that gives you an idea of sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs N F McLearnon

customer_reviews.title: ... running shop and ordered the update - I was pleased that they still fit as well and are very
customer_reviews.text: Was previously fitted for an older model of these in a pro running shop and ordered the update - I was pleased that they still fit as well and are very comfy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered half a size bigger but after removing insoles and ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered half a size bigger but after removing insoles and inserting my own they were a little tight. I would order one side up next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I previously had a pair of Brooks GTS so I ...
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a pair of Brooks GTS so I ordered the same size. For some reason the sizes are smaller now !? I had to go up another half size. Still loving Brooks though
customer_reviews.author: Heather Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, ordering another pair as soon as I ...
customer_reviews.text: I normally take size five half to six - ordered these in six half, I need these for running in and they had enough extra room for me, definitely not too big!! Great shoes, ordering another pair as soon as I get paid..they are like walking on air.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Great support and comfort but sizing is small
customer_reviews.text: Lovely shoe but sizing is definitely smaller than the GTS 14 pair I have.

customer_reviews.title: They are very supportive and were recommended by her
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these for my daughter for years. They are very supportive and were recommended by her podiatrist

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great item but always buy a size up in brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great product but I ordered a half size larger than ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product but I ordered a half size larger than I previously had (in the same shoe the year before) as I found this model slightly smaller than before. Exactly as described, good quality, great trainers and delivery arrived on time.

customer_reviews.title: Love these trainers
customer_reviews.text: I love Brooks Adrenaline, they support my foot well and give me confidence knowing that my foot is striking the ground firmly.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great quality but order at least half a size bigger!!

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: The material on top of trainer and rubber sole tore after two months of occasional running in the park.

customer_reviews.text: Have had Brooks before do knew they'd be ok. Good running trainers with good support. Many thanks xx

customer_reviews.title: Very good shoe, the support of the foot is very ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good shoe, the support of the foot is very good and my wife is now achieving PB in most events.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I love this brand. It never disappoints. Good, very prompt service.

customer_reviews.title: Great. Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Great. Exactly as described, I always buy brooks trainers this is the first time I have ordered any online would definitely recommend and fast delivery too!

customer_reviews.title: Not trail shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought them as I thought they were trail shoes as the description states but they're road shoes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them - the new soles for 2015 work well for me. :)

customer_reviews.title: fitted great got half a size up as advised
customer_reviews.text: Came sooner than expected.fitted great got half a size up as advised .Super comfortable .Great service

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit, I'm training for a half marathon and ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit, I'm training for a half marathon and since receiving them I've run several miles and have had no blisters!!
customer_reviews.author: Gill Codling

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately in my case they still fit ok
customer_reviews.text: The Brooks Adrenaline 15 are a smaller fit then the 14 model. Fortunately in my case they still fit ok.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Look the part but come up far too small. ...
customer_reviews.text: Look the part but come up far too small. I am usually a five so ordered 5.5, however still felt right around the toes
customer_reviews.author: Kim Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good trainer, long lasting, look good and fit well.
customer_reviews.author: clare hazelden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item was just as described and arrived in good time.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Gorringe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit same as old pair that were the 14 version.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: ... were a present for my daughter but she is pleased with the fit
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were a present for my daughter but she is pleased with the fit. Obviously it is early days as yet but the shoes are comfortable and give a feeling of confidence whether on pavement or grass. There have been no early issues with blisters or any other twinges in ankles or knees. The colour is very bright so if you like shades of pink and blue you'll love these.
customer_reviews.author: JOHNBOY80

customer_reviews.title: Not my purchase
customer_reviews.text: As this was bought my daughter, I am unable to rate these trainers, but my daughter seems pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Jill R. Coombes

customer_reviews.title: When I put in wide the site recommended my usual size so that is what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet. When I put in wide the site recommended my usual size so that is what I ordered. They are quite tight and this particular type of trainer is a little short in the foot. I can live with them but only just. and I am hoping the will stretch a little widthways.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice shoes but ordered wrong size hence returned to be re-ordered
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Hart

product_meta.title: Brooks Adrenaline Gts 15, Women's Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Brooks have switched their attention to the underfoot flex by adding Omega Flex Grooves and continuing Omni Grooves in the forefoot, allowing the outsole to bend and shape naturally. Continuing with the tradition of a tailored fit, stretch eyelets lock into the medial side to capture the foot better and technologies like Flextra and anatomical Brooks DNA deliver customised stability and cushioning. Designed for the over-pronator, the shoe is designed with Brooks's signature PDRB - a triple-density post on the medial side of the shoe for extra support and allows for progressive pronation control and creates a smoother transition. Featuring the award winning Brooks's BioMoGo midsole, renovations have been instigated. The BioGoMo now includes 'DNA'; responding to your unique stride, a unique adaptive cushioning system is introduced. By adapting to your specific weight pace, gait and running surface, DNA offers personalized cushioning, adding a spring to your step. The Heel Caterpillar Crash Pad has been updated with a full-length segmented crash pad, delivering flexibility underfoot without sacrificing assurance. The added length supplies adaptable cushioning to every unique stride, for smooth transitions. This is a shoe designed for the overpronator who also needs maximum cushioning from their ride, now providing greater flexibility.Great for road running and Ideal for Flat to Medium Arches.
